content.rendered:
Directed by Sandeep Reddy Vanga.

Written by Mandela Pedaswamy.

Cast Vijay Deverakonda(Arjun (as Deverakonda Vijay Sai)). Shalini Pandey(Preeti). Jia Sharma(Jia Sharma). Kanchana(Arjun’s Grandmother). Sanjay Swaroop(Dhanunjay Reddy Deshmukh). Bhushan Kalyan(Dean of St. Mary’s College).Sandhya Janak. Kamal Kamaraju(Arjun’s Brother). Padmaja(Preethi’s Mother). R.J. Hemant((as Mirchi Hemanth)). Rahul Ramakrishna(Shiva). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(Vipul (as Priyadarshi)).Kalyan Vitappu. Amit Sharma(Amit).Sri Sudha. Lahari Shari((as Lahari)).Kalpalatha.Swaynthika. Sravya Mrudula(Shruthi – Preethi’s friend).Sundaram.Meghana.Greeshma.Malli.Lakshmi Kiran.Lakshmi Narayana.Pawan Chowdary.Pawan Shenoy.Jai.Raghu.Manikanta Lakkemshetty.Prashanth.Bhanu Prasad.Krishnamurthy.Muralikrishna.Kaalicharan.Meesam Suresh.Sangeetha.Bharathi Rao.Samatha Sharma.Keerthika.Ramarao.Anusha.Nagendra.Ramadevi.Raju.Parushuram.Gabru Shaik.Arun Babu.Manikanta.Auto Srinu.Kavitha.Yamini Manthena.Roopa Prabhakar.Swamy Machiraju.Harshavardhan Reddy Alla.Suman Philip.Mubeen Ahmed Khan.Twinkle.Uma.Shirisha.Sandhya.Aruna Puvvada.Suhaas . Gopinath Bhat(Devdas Shetty – Preethi’s father). Aneesha Dama(Keerthi). Kalyan((as Kalyan Babu)). Aditi Myakal(Vidya (as Adithi)). Pradeep Rajput(Raghav).Sri Saibaba. Kalyan Subramanyam(Kamal). Sandeep Reddy Vanga(Narrator)

Language Telugu.

Producers Prabhakar Reddy Vanga. Pranay Reddy Vanga. Krishna Vodapalli.

Production Bhadrakali Pictures.
